channel.title: NLP on Shangeth
channel.description: Recent content in NLP on Shangeth

item.title: Character Generating RNN
item.description: Character level language model of RNN(LSTM) in PyTorch.

item.title: Emojification
item.description: Emojify a sentence with NLP, flask server to emojify a sentence.

item.title: NYTimes Topic Modelling
item.description: Topic Modelling for New York Times news articles for given dates using NYTimes API.

item.title: Seq2Seq Machine Translation
item.description: Machine Translation english to french using Seq2Seq Attention model in PyTorch.

item.title: Twitter Sentiment analysis
item.description: Sentiment analysis of tweets of any topic fetched with twitter API and sentiment analysis of the tweets with NLTK.
